mapper.sql: id, user_id, mobile, login_from, login_ip, add_time
mapper.select: select distinct(user_id) from user_logined where add_time > (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW())- 3600*24*30)
mapper.insert:
insert into user_logined
id,
user_id,
mobile,
login_from,
login_ip,
add_time,

mapper.update:
update user_logined
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=CHAR},
login_from = #{loginFrom,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
login_ip = #{loginIp,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}

update user_logined set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=CHAR}, login_from = #{loginFrom,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, login_ip = #{loginIp,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC} where id = #{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
